channel.title: one on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in one on Barefoot Rob

item.title: re-connection
item.description: 23:15 Friday 12 May 2017 JST After we stood hand in hand for a while, she said she felt very connected to the forest through me. I asked if I could bless her with a hug.. after a few moments of hug, I just started to cry. "It's so good to see you again. I have missed you so much." Wow. Thank you. And I caught my train on time.
